verbose_text: This hypothesis was tested in traumatized aged flies as well as in flies with a disorder of the innate immune system using as controls Drosophila adipokinetic hormone receptor (akhr) mutant flies and chico mutant flies with mutations in insulin receptor substrate (IRS), a Drosophila homolog of vertebrate IRS1-4, who overexpress triglycerides.
